short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emoti creates an easy-to-use dropdown menu for inserting emoticons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Emoti is a chrome extension that allows users to easily save custom emoticons and insert them into text box inputs, such as Facebook status updates or tweets.
